Class UserSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.UserSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UIController<UserDetails>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Registration

    public class UserSettings
extends Object
implements UIController<UserDetails>
    This class represents a controller for UserSettings.
    Author:
    Matěj Bartoň (bartom47@fel.cvut.cz)

        public void setControlled(UserDetails controled)
        See UIController for more information.

      • loadUser

        public void loadUser(Users activeUser)
        Loads information about user into the UserDetails dialog.
        Parameters:
        activeUser - - a Users entity

      • checkEmail

        public boolean checkEmail()
        Checks if the user email is yet represented in database.
        Returns:
        true if the email is not in database, false if the email is in database or if the email field is empty

      • loadSections

        public void loadSections()
        Loads sections into the UserDetails.fieldSection. This method also loads the information whether user belongs to some section.

      • saveUser

        public void saveUser()
        Saves information about the user in the database.

      • changePasswd

        public void changePasswd()
        Changes password for the user. (UC03)

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser()
        Deletes the selected user from the system. Before the process a confirm dialog is shown to prevent unwanted deletions.
